questions.a: Game Shelf is a **free app** that tracks all your daily puzzle games (Wordle, Connections, etc.) in one place. Instead of losing track of streaks or forgetting scores, Game Shelf keeps everything organized automatically.

Three simple steps:

1. **Add games** to your shelf from the Games tab
2. **Play your games** normally
3. **Record results** by copying share text and tapping Record Game

That's it! Game Shelf handles the rest.
Yes! All core features are **completely free**: tracking, stats, streaks, friends, and battles. Optional coin purchases unlock premium rewards, but you never need to pay.

questions.q: Do I need to create an account?
questions.a: No account required for basic tracking. However, **signing in with Google** unlocks: sync across devices, friends, battles, AI hints, leaderboards, and automatic backup.

questions.q: How do I record a game result?
questions.a:
After finishing a puzzle:

1. Tap the game's **share button** to copy results
2. Return to Game Shelf
3. Tap **Record Game**

Game Shelf reads your clipboard and logs automatically.

questions.q: What if automatic recording doesn't work?
questions.a: **Long-press** (hold) the Record Game button to open manual entry. Select the game from the dropdown and enter your score manually.

questions.q: Can I record multiple games at once?
questions.a: Yes! If you copy text containing **multiple game results** (like from a group chat), Game Shelf parses them all in one paste.

questions.q: What if I record the wrong score?
questions.a: If you record the same game twice in one day, you'll be asked to **Keep** the original or **Replace** it with the new score.

questions.q: Why doesn't Game Shelf recognize my result?
questions.a:
Common reasons:

‚Ä¢ **Game not supported** - check our games list
‚Ä¢ **Modified share text** - use the original format
‚Ä¢ **Extra text added** - paste only the game result
‚Ä¢ **Clipboard empty** - copy the share text first
34+ games including: **Wordle**, **Connections**, **Strands**, Mini, Spelling Bee, Quordle, Queens, Tango, Worldle, Framed, and more. See Games tab ‚Üí Browse for the full list.
A **streak** counts consecutive days playing the same game. Miss a day = streak resets to 0. Each game has its own separate streak.
Streaks reset if you **miss a day**. Playing at 11:59 PM still counts - it's based on calendar days in your local timezone, not 24-hour periods.
**Midnight in your local timezone.** Note: games themselves might reset at different times (Wordle resets midnight Eastern), but Game Shelf tracks YOUR play in YOUR timezone.

questions.q: Where can I see my stats?
questions.a:
Multiple places:

‚Ä¢ **Stats tab** - overview of all games
‚Ä¢ **Game card** - shows streak and today's status
‚Ä¢ **Long-press ‚Üí Stats** - detailed breakdown for one game

questions.q: What stats does Game Shelf track?
questions.a: For each game: **games played**, **current streak**, **max streak**, **win rate**, **average score**, and complete play history.
Game Shelf can give you **AI-powered hints** for certain puzzles. Hints range from subtle nudges to direct answers - you control the level.

**NYT Games**: Connections, Wordle, Strands, Spelling Bee, Mini
**Game Shelf Originals**: Quotle, Rungs, Slate
**5 tokens per hint.** You start with 50 free tokens and earn more through gameplay.

Ten levels from **Whisper** (barely helpful) to **Answer** (full solution):

1-3: Vague nudges
4-6: Clearer guidance
7-9: Significant help
10: Complete answer

Default is level 4 (Nudge).

You need:

‚Ä¢ **Signed in** with Google
‚Ä¢ At least **5 tokens**
‚Ä¢ Under rate limits (20/hour, 50/day)

Check your token balance in the Wallet.
**Brain Battles** are competitions between 2+ players over multiple days. Everyone plays the same games, and scores are compared. Winner takes the prize pool!

questions.q: How do I create a battle?
questions.a:
Hub tab ‚Üí Battles ‚Üí **Create Battle**

Choose: name, games (1-8), duration (1-30 days), battle type, stakes, and visibility.

Four types:

‚Ä¢ **Total Score** - highest combined score wins
‚Ä¢ **Most Wins** - each win = 1 point
‚Ä¢ **Perfect Hunter** - only perfect scores count
‚Ä¢ **Streak Challenge** - daily completion bonuses

‚Ä¢ **Friendly** - free, bragging rights only
‚Ä¢ **Coins** - 1-5 coins entry, winner takes 80%
‚Ä¢ **Tokens** - 1-500 tokens entry, winner takes 80%

Public battles are always friendly.

questions.q: How do I join a battle?
questions.a:
Three ways:

‚Ä¢ Enter the **6-character code**
‚Ä¢ Click an **invite link**
‚Ä¢ Browse **public battles** in Hub ‚Üí Battles

questions.q: What if I forget to play a battle game?
questions.a: Your Home screen shows a **reminder banner** for unplayed battle games. Missing games hurts your score but doesn't disqualify you.

Hub ‚Üí Friends ‚Üí **Add Friend**

‚Ä¢ Enter their **8-character friend code**
‚Ä¢ Share your **friend link**
‚Ä¢ Use **Find Friends** to check contacts
Find your unique **8-character code** in Hub ‚Üí Friends. Share it so others can add you!
Friends can see: your **profile**, **leaderboard rankings**, and **activity status** (played today or not). They can't see your full history or detailed stats.

If a friend hasn't played today, tap their profile ‚Üí **Nudge to Play**. They'll see a notification next time they open Game Shelf.

Limit: one nudge per friend per day.
Compare with friends by games played: **daily**, **weekly**, or **monthly** rankings. Access via Hub ‚Üí Friends ‚Üí Leaderboard.

questions.q: What's the difference between tokens and coins?
questions.a:
**Tokens** = free currency, earned through play. Use for hints and token battles.

**Coins** = purchased currency. Use for coin battles and rewards shop.

‚Ä¢ **New account**: 50 tokens
‚Ä¢ **5+ games/day**: 5 tokens
‚Ä¢ **5-day streak**: 10 tokens
‚Ä¢ **All GS originals**: 5 tokens
‚Ä¢ **Win battles**: from prize pool
‚Ä¢ **Referrals**: 10-50 tokens
Hub ‚Üí Wallet ‚Üí **Buy Coins**. Select a package and complete purchase via Stripe. Coins never expire.

Signing in enables: **sync across devices**, friends, battles, AI hints, leaderboards, and **automatic backup**. Without sign-in, data only exists on your current device.
Menu ‚Üí Account ‚Üí **Sign in with Google**. Select your Google account and you're done! Data syncs automatically.

questions.q: Will I lose data if I switch devices?
questions.a:
**If signed in**: No - your data syncs automatically. Just sign in on the new device.

**If not signed in**: Yes - data is device-only and can't be recovered.

questions.q: How do I delete my account?
questions.a: Menu ‚Üí Account ‚Üí **Delete Account**. This permanently removes all data from our servers. This action cannot be undone.
Check that the game was actually recorded (see History). If it's there, the streak should be correct. If you played close to midnight, timezone differences might have affected which day it counted.
iOS asks permission each time. When you see **"Allow Paste?"**, tap **Allow**. If denied, try again or use manual entry (long-press Record Game).

Try:

‚Ä¢ **Reinstall PWA**: Remove from home screen, re-add

**If not signed in**: Local data can be lost when clearing browser data - unfortunately this can't be recovered. Always sign in for backup!

questions.q: A game I play isn't supported
questions.a: Menu ‚Üí Help ‚Üí **Suggest a Game**. Include the game name, URL, and sample share text. We add new games regularly!

questions.q: What data does Game Shelf collect?
questions.a: Your **puzzle results**, stats, and activity. If signed in, your Google profile info (name, email, photo) for identification. We don't track your browsing or access games directly.
